thread.title: Le Pradey Pais
thread.title_full: Le Pradey Pais - Review of Le Pradey, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Terry C
title: Le Pradey Pais
text:
Brilliant Hotel great location Fantastic Staff Extremely Helpful and Polite,
Would not Hesitate visiting again.
Highly Recommend a visit to anyone visiting Paris, situated on the River Sane,
rooms are quiet with tv beds very comfortable (I have arthritis of the spine) and no trouble with the Hotel weather it be Sleeping or getting around.
Well Worth Visiting
Room Tip: access for wheelchairs or stairs See more room tips
